message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and satisfaction. Given its quality and the benefits it offers, I believe it's worth more than its face value. I am offering it to you for $120, which includes not only the product itself but also a comprehensive guide on how to maximize its use and enjoy its full potential. This is an exclusive opportunity to experience the best we have to offer at a special rate. Would you like to accept this offer?
